mapper.insert: insert into user (email, password, name, user_profile_image_url, sido, gugun) values (#{userEmail}, #{userPassword},#{userName}, #{sido}, #{gugun});
mapper.update: update user set name=#{userName}, password=#{userPassword}, user_profile_image_url=#{userProfileImageUrl}, sido=#{sido}, gugun=#{gugun} where uuid=#{uuid}
